mapper.select: SELECT gm.GROUP_NO groupNo, g.GROUP_NAME groupName,g.group_address groupAddress, g.GROUP_PICTURE groupImage, grm.cnum memberNum, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST WHERE GROUP_NO = Grm.GROUP_NO) postNum FROM (SELECT GROUP_NO , count(*) cnum FROM GROUP_MEMBER GROUP BY GROUP_NO) grm JOIN GROUPS g ON (grm.GROUP_NO = g.GROUP_NO ) JOIN GROUP_MEMBER gm on (grm.GROUP_NO=gm.GROUP_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO= #{mno}

select * from (select ROWNUM RNUM, al.* from (SELECT DISTINCT gm.GROUP_NO groupNo, g.GROUP_NAME groupName,g.group_address groupAddress, g.GROUP_PICTURE groupImage, grm.cnum memberNum, PN.cnum postNum FROM (SELECT GROUP_NO , count(*) cnum FROM GROUP_MEMBER GROUP BY GROUP_NO) grm JOIN GROUPS g ON (grm.GROUP_NO = g.GROUP_NO ) JOIN GROUP_MEMBER gm on (grm.GROUP_NO=gm.GROUP_NO) JOIN (SELECT GROUP_NO , count(*) cnum FROM POST NATURAL FULL JOIN GROUPS GROUP BY GROUP_NO) pn ON (pn.GROUP_NO = GRM.GROUP_NO) order by membernum desc) al) where RNUM between 1 and 4
